segments.text: The scene is set in a bright kitchen during the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, drying a plate meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, basin full, overflow starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms, lapping at cabinet bases.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron sways as she works, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, open cabinet with cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs stool, which leans precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He grabs cookies, plate in other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands ready, palm open for hers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window shows neat garden path and fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light streams in, highlighting the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to accidents easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet it's a vivid snapshot of home life.
segments.speaker: PAR
